    I am Madhura Parikh, a software developer in Seattle, working at the earth’s most customer centric company. Previously I finished my Masters in Computer Science from The University of Texas, Austin and my B.Tech in Computer Engineering from National Institute of Technology, Surat (India). More details may be found at LinkedIn.
